intro: Ride, stunt, and soar: become the ultimate dirt bike champion!
description:
Dirt Bike Extreme 3D invites you to unleash your inner daredevil in an exhilarating motorbike adventure! Immerse yourself in the action as you tackle diverse terrains and thrilling experiences in the role of a fearless biker.

Navigate through multiple levels, each featuring its own unique map—whether you’re tearing through urban landscapes, wild western terrains, sun-soaked beaches, and lush jungle trails. With strategically placed checkpoints, every second counts as you strive to complete each level with style and precision.

Your mission? Pull off jaw-dropping tricks and stunts on your motorcycle to win points and beat the clock, earning a maximum number of stars. Collect money with every stunt and invest in new motorcycles that enhance your speed, agility and accuracy.

Get ready to rev your engines and experience the thrill of high-speed action, impressive tricks, and fierce competition. Will you rise to the occasion and become the ultimate biker champion in Dirt Bike Extreme 3D? The race for glory begins now!
